# CapturedRoom.AttributesCodableRepresentation

**Structure**

A serializable set of details that describe an object in the room.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AttributesCodableRepresentation
```

## Overview

}

## Creating an attributes codable representation

- **init(from:)**: Deserializes an attributes codable representation from the given decoder.
- **init(attributes:)**: Creates an attributes codable representation with the given collection of object attributes.

## Accessing room attributes

- **attributes**: A collection of object attributes.

## Serializing a captured room

- **encode(to:)**: Serializes a captured room to the specified encoder.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
